ctx: intros n f Hf g Hg.
exceptions.tactic: apply PrimRec_ind with (P := fun n f => isPR n (compose2 n f g)).
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat f : naryFunc n Hf : isPR n f g : naryFunc (S n) Hg : isPR (S n) g n0 : nat f0 : naryFunc n0 The term "g" has type "naryFunc (S n)" while it is expected to have type "naryFunc (S n0)" (cannot unify "(fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end) n" and "(fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end) n0").
